content: I think I'll take your advice and watch one episode per night. I'm excited to dive into the world of "The Good Place" and explore its moral dilemmas and philosophical concepts. By the way, do you think the show's humor will clash with my usual evening routine, which involves unwinding before bed? I like to keep things light-hearted and relaxing in the evening, so I'm wondering if the show's tone will fit in with that.
